title: xAI Announces Open Source Release of Grok AI
summary: xAI, founded by Elon Musk, announced plans to open source its Grok AI chatbot in March 2024. This followed ongoing legal disputes with OpenAI and amid broader industry discussions about AI transparency and development practices.
